content: what a great looking wrap for your 40 oz tumbler with a handle the wrap fits well there is an option to add a button and loop that is functional as well as decorative here s why you will love this crochet pattern 1 makes a wonderful gift for friends teachers co-workers or anyone who loves their tumbler 2 perfect for mother s day birthdays holidays or just because 3 a great craft show project affordable to make eye-catching and sure to sell fast 4 works up quickly making it easy to stock your craft booth or whip up last-minute presents pattern details 1 crochet pattern pdf download american standard terms 2 any worsted weight yarn 4 designed for a 40 oz tumbler with handle 3 easy to read written instructions with helpful guidance 4 suitable for confident beginners and beyond 5 video support is available on my youtube channel https //www youtube com/channel/ucv9ty2ft2myutvveynaiavg 1 this crochet tumbler wrap pattern is a thoughtful and practical project that makes for a beautiful present or a best-seller at your next craft fair or bazaar it s a blank slate ready for you to embellish and show your own personality designed to fit a 40 oz handled tumbler this wrap adds charm coziness and personality to a plain cup while also protecting hands from condensation it s quick to make fun to customize with different yarn colors and sure to impress gift recipients and craft show shoppers alike whether you re crocheting for your own tumbler stocking your craft fair booth or making thoughtful handmade gifts this crochet tumbler wrap pattern is a must-have for your collection upgrade your tumbler with a cozy that s as stylish as it is practical copyright statement this pattern is protected by copyright©krissysoverthemountaincrochet 2025 do not distribute alter or share this pattern in any shape or form you have my permission to sell the product you make using my pattern no mass production is allowed you are responsible for the finished product 1
